name: Beware The Night Guard
description:
After a nice day at the Smoketree Picnic Grounds, you go home and realize you left your wallet at the picnic site where you and your daughter were.

Even though you hate the dark, you decide to go back to the Smoketree Picnic Grounds that night to go find your wallet.

GAMEPLAY:
  • Find your missing items.
  • Watch out for The Night Guard.
NOTABLE FEATURES:
  • Terrifying AI that will keep you on your toes.
  • Large, dark, and creepy environment for the player to explore.
  • Hardcore Mode (Unlocked after beating game normally).
  • Creepy and intense sounds.
  • A map for navigating.
